main event: Two witnesses observed a very bright, flickering light in the sky that traveled rapidly and disappeared.
interesting points: The sighting lasted about 5 minutes., The object was described as being very bright and flickering., The witnesses could not determine the size, shape, or altitude of the object., The phenomenon was classified as having insufficient data for evaluation., The sighting was reported in Cincinnati, Ohio.
witness description: witnesses included Nicholas Radoji and Herman Pilot Durke, 23, a Pan-American Airlines employee.
